issues.title: Missing JSON-LD Structured Data
issues.description: The page does not contain any JSON-LD structured data blocks. JSON-LD helps search engines and AI systems understand page content.

issues.title: Missing Organization Schema
issues.description: The page does not contain an Organization schema. This schema helps establish brand identity and business information.

issues.title: Missing WebPage Schema
issues.description: The page does not contain a WebPage schema. This schema helps search engines understand page structure and metadata.

issues.title: Invalid JSON-LD
issues.description: One or more JSON-LD blocks on the page contain invalid JSON or cannot be parsed.

issues.title: Incomplete Schema
issues.description: The schema markup is missing required fields for its type, reducing its effectiveness.

issues.title: Schema Best Practices Violation
issues.description: The schema markup does not follow Google's structured data guidelines and best practices.

issues.title: Multiple H1 Headings
issues.description: The page contains multiple H1 headings. Best practice is to have exactly one H1 per page.

issues.title: Invalid Heading Hierarchy
issues.description: The heading structure does not follow proper hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3). Headings should not skip levels.

issues.title: Insufficient Content
issues.description: The page has insufficient word count for AI systems to understand context and meaning.

issues.title: Poor Content Organization
issues.description: Content is not organized into logical sections, making it difficult for AI systems to parse and understand.

issues.title: Missing Title Tag
issues.description: The page does not have a title tag. Title tags are critical for SEO and AI understanding.

issues.title: Title Length Suboptimal
issues.description: The title tag is not within the optimal length range (50-60 characters) for search results display.

issues.title: Missing Meta Description
issues.description: The page does not have a meta description. Meta descriptions help search engines and AI systems understand page content.

issues.title: Missing Canonical URL
issues.description: The page does not have a canonical URL. Canonical URLs help prevent duplicate content issues.

issues.title: Missing FAQ Section
issues.description: The page does not have an FAQ section with structured data. FAQ sections help with answer surfaces in AI-powered search.

issues.title: Missing HowTo Section
issues.description: The page does not have a HowTo structured data section. HowTo sections help with step-by-step answer surfaces.

issues.title: Unclear Content Language
issues.description: The content uses unclear or overly complex language that may be difficult for AI systems to understand.

issues.title: Missing Definitions
issues.description: Technical terms are used without definitions, making content less accessible to AI systems.
